gen:link.msg:message: `ResultDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatements` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ResultDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatements')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ResultDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatements return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfResultDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatementsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfResultDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatementsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfResultDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatementsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfResultDifferenceSeparateConsolidatedFinancialStatementsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ResultSeparateFinancialStatements` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ResultSeparateFinancialStatements')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ResultSeparateFinancialStatements return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfResultSeparateFinancialStatementsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfResultSeparateFinancialStatementsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfResultSeparateFinancialStatementsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDifferencesResultConsolidatedSeparate_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfResultSeparateFinancialStatementsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
